comments.body:
Thanks for the quick update.

Actually, this should be ```{% include_example classification r/ml/fmClassifier.R %}``` or remove the ```classification``` from these two lines in the example (It might be better to update the example):
```# $example on:classification$```
```# $example off:classification$```
Otherwise, the docs build will fail. 

When I do documentation changes, I normally build and check. Here are the instructions for how to build the docs:
https://github.com/apache/spark/tree/master/docs
Yeah, let's put it on hold for a few weeks, until I am back on environment on which I can test things.
